RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMALONA prompted the pace through the turn extending abreast rival in upper stretch going full out to edge clear late. THATS ALL SHEWROTE away alertly worked the pace on a narrow lead through the turn battling down the lane ceding grudgingly late along the inside. PAYNT THE KITTY tracked evenly to upper stretch moving outside rivals in the four path edging closer late. SHEZAGOLDGETTER raced evenly throughout gaining one spot late. DAYS REMEMBERED was always a step slow. YAZZERA (PER) was never involved. GREGS POSSE bobbling at the break showed early speed fading down the lane. SPICEY SECRET was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Thats All Shewrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, worked on narrow lead inside, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Shezagoldgetter
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked more

ENTRY.NAME: Yazzera (PER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Gregs Posse
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, brief foot,

ENTRY.NAME: Spicey Secret
ENTRY.OWNER: Clemmer, Sheryl R. and Bachis, Taryn L.
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Days Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: always a step slow

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt the Kitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, 4 wide lane, edging closer late

ENTRY.NAME: Mamalona
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, extended abreast lane, edged up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A LATE ONE gave a prompted middle move wresting the lead outside the quarter pole shaking clear in upper stretch finishing with a comfortable margin. EASY STRIDE saved ground rallying on the backside chasing through the far turn being dispatched in upper stretch angling out late a clear second best. BRYTON'S D J hustled out was used on pace being caught outside the quarter pole dropping back in upper stretch. MIDNIGHT ALIBI stayed close for a half mile fading into the far turn. CLEVELAND POWER folded up into the far turn. TWO GOLD SPOTS broke late trailing throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Bryton's D J
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, used on pace, passed 1/4 pole, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Cleveland Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: folded into the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Two Gold Spots
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke late, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Stride
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, vied inside far turn, no match lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: close for 1/2, faded

ENTRY.NAME: A Late One
ENTRY.OWNER: Grayson Jr Bob Crown Racing Stable and Matejka Pavel
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, led 1/4 pole, drew clear top lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEJOHN stalked the pace pressing to put a head in front at the half, couldn't shake rival extending outside of foe down the lane rallying up late. FARTLEK set the pace being hooked at the half battling back to a narrow lead on the far turn digging deep down the lane ceding late on the inside. LUVTHEONEURWITH off slowly lagged to upper stretch moving up there with a mild rally in the three path. CHOPPED gained contention with an inside move on the far turn then weakened the final sixteenth. CATCHING MAGIC tracked evenly to the far turn then faded into upper stretch. WHISKEY SUNRISE extended in bid on the far turn would give way in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fartlek
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, hooked 1/2, battled back inside, led late,

ENTRY.NAME: Luvtheoneurwith
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged to lane, moved up with mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Chopped
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained inside far turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Dejohn
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed from 1/2, abreast lane, rallied up late

ENTRY.NAME: Catching Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: extended far turn, spent

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 21, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eli gibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ONEPRETTYTHING moved on pace looming into upper stretch rallying to a late lead in the three path holding under modest urging. OUR FLIRTATION slow early cut the corner into upper stretch gaining while in a touch close mid stretch continuing on gamely to the wire along the rail. LADY MADISON raced evenly moving five wide through the turn into upper stretch surging late at mid track. GOLDEN ACCOUNT angled out rushing up on the turn vying willingly four wide down the lane. STRADARI sent hard pressed a narrow lead inside of rivals through the turn into upper stretch weakening late while drifting in. FIANNA HILLS pressed three deep through the turn weakening into upper stretch. CHECK SIX was never involved. HOT AUGUST STORM wilted on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Check Six
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Madison
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide on turn, surged late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Stradari
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed inside of foes, weakened drifted in lane

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled out rallying on the turn, bid willingly 4 wide lane

ENTRY.NAME: Oneprettything
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved on pace, loomed into lane, rallied up in three path

ENTRY.NAME: Fianna Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed three deep, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hot August Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: wilted on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Our Flirtation
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, cut corner to lane, bid gamely on rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: XTRAORDINARYMOTION broke sharply moving on a clear lead through the turn into upper stretch widening there while ridden out. FAST RIDE chased the pace while saving ground to upper stretch proving clearly second best there. WHY WINCHILL WHY slow early raced evenly through the lane as no threat. PETITE N' SMITTY faded into upper stretch. BABY BONNIE was always outrun. CLASSY REY DE ORO dipped down at the break then shortly after throwing the rider, walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Xtraordinarymotion
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, clear on lead, drew off ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Why Winchill Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, evenly inside lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, saved ground to lane, clearly second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Classy Rey de Oro
ENTRY.OWNER: Miotke Elise Miotke Matthew and Energy Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dipped down break and again after throwing rider, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Bonnie
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Petite n' Smitty
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded into upper stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Esti mating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWESOME MINER surged along the inside to put a head in front at the quarter pole dueling inside of rival down the lane digging in determinedly late. CON ON THE RUN pressured from the outset dueling abreast rival into upper stretch matching strides from the eighth pole being denied at the end. FREE SPEECH saved ground to upper stretch vying willingly from the rail there. AW ITE hustled along chased through the turn into upper stretch weakening late in the four path. THE COOKIE MAN pressed through the turn then faded in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Miner
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside bid turn, dueled to wire, dug deep

ENTRY.NAME: Free Speech
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, vied willingly at rail

ENTRY.NAME: Con On the Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast through lane, gave all

ENTRY.NAME: Aw Ite
ENTRY.OWNER: Inman Betty Tunstall Shirley and Tunstall James
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased to lane, bit short

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRACING NASTY pressed a short lead through the turn digging in to upper stretch continuing under pressure abreast rival needing all to prevail. CHURCH KEY sent hard pressed the pace dueling inside of rival through the turn then down the stretch battling to the end. LADY ITCH was carried out at the break dropping back lagging to upper stretch finishing evenly on the inside. HOPS PETUNIA pressed early then weakened on the turn fading to upper stretch. FOREST ACCLAMATION bore out at the break.

ENTRY.NAME: Hops Petunia
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, weakened turn, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Church Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent hard, pressed pace, dueled inside of foe lane, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Fracing Nasty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on short lead, dug in to lane, needed all

ENTRY.NAME: Forest Acclamation
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out at the break

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Itch
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out break, lagged to lane, finished evenly,

Non-winners Of A Race Since April 21 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).

ELUSIVE MOTION raced evenly through the turn coming five wide into upper stretch surging late at mid track. OFFUTT COLE hustled along chased to upper stretch needing a bit more at the end. FIFTY PESOS slow early lost ground to upper stretch bidding late seven wide. PITMAN sent hard pressed the pace dueling into upper stretch coming a short late on the inside. CONFIDENT N ELITE hustled out dueled through the turn into upper stretch weakening late on the inside. HARTEL slow early played no factor. OVERSEAS LETTER was never involved. WAR DOCTOR off slowly was always outrun. ZERO FOR CONDUCT was always outrun.
